Info.Title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
Info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Info.Writer: Chris Van Allsburg (book), David Koepp (screenplay), John Kamps (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Jonah Bobo, Josh Hutcherson, Dax Shepard, Kristen Stewart
Info.Plot: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.
